query.statement: SELECT DISTINCT MENU.PGCD1 ,MENU.PGCD2 ,PGCD.PCODE AS PGCD3 ,'' AS PGCD ,MENU.MANDT ,VALUE((SELECT RTRIM(PNAME) FROM SAPHEE.ZWBLANG AS LANG WHERE LANG.MANDT=MENU.MANDT AND LANG.PCODE=MENU.PGCD3 AND LANG.PLANG=#G_LANG#),PGCD.PDESC) AS MENU_NAME ,CASE WHEN MENU.PGCD3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE 'S' END AS FLAG ,CASE WHEN MENU.PGCD3 IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS CHK ,'3' AS LEVEL ,VALUE(SUBSTR(MENU.REMARK,1,6),'') AS REMARK FROM SAPHEE.ZWBMENU AS MENU RIGHT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBPGCD AS PGCD ON MENU.MANDT = PGCD.MANDT AND MENU.PGCD3 = PGCD.PCODE AND MENU.PGCD1 = #PGCD1# AND MENU.PGCD2 = #PGCD2# WHERE LENGTH(PGCD.PCODE) = 6 AND PGCD.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PUSED = 'Y' ORDER BY CHK DESC, REMARK, PGCD.PCODE WITH UR
